level.heading: Areas of special flood hazard and shaded X-Zones.
level.text: ยง 27-3003.1 Areas of special flood hazard and shaded X-Zones. Electrical work performed on structures located in areas of special flood hazard and shaded X-Zones, as defined in section G201.2 of the New York city building code, shall also comply with the provisions of appendix G of the New York city building code. Where, in any specific case, the provisions of this code conflict with the provisions of appendix G of the New York city building code, the more restrictive shall govern.
